segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is absolutely overflowing, water streaming onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, just pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing right in front of it is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the puddle, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of what's happening around them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear for the water damage that's certainly occurring right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This beautiful kitchen will be ruined if she doesn't notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running, endlessly wasting water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly baffling to witness this calm amidst the growing chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just shout to her to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR
